gameDetails.name: Prophecy: Water Realm
gameDetails.description:
In Prophecy: Water Realm, the second expansion for the Prophecy fantasy adventure game, you will be invited to enter another astral sphere. Dive into unknown depths and try to recover mighty artifacts guarded by mythical monsters and deadly water maelstroms. If you venture deep into the Water Realm, you'll return with pockets full of gold and treasure - assuming you manage to return, that is.

That's not all! There is an isolated island where the most famous pirate of all time hides the most powerful items ever created by a human. During your adventures, search for fragments of an old map that show you the way to the treasure.
